programme.title: Boy George
programme.short_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is musician Boy George
programme.medium_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is musician Boy George.
programme.long_synopsis:
The castaway in this week's Desert Island Discs is someone who has experienced the delights of international stardom and acclaim, and the misery of failure when his fame turned sour and his popularity plummeted. The flamboyant Boy George will be talking to Sue Lawley about the ups and downs of his professional and private life.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs] 

Favourite track: It Must Be Love by Madness
Book: Photograph album
Luxury: Radio receiver

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
